entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
